headline: Fortive (NYSE:FTV) Drops 12% Over One Week During Market Turbulence Caused By President Trump's Tariffs
summary: Fortive (NYSE:FTV) has recently sustained a 12% decline in its share price over the last week. This comes amid two key announcements: the appointment of Mark D. Okerstrom as Senior Vice President and the affirmation of a regular quarterly dividend of $0.08 per share. These developments, while significant, occurred during a period of substantial market turmoil, primarily due to President Trump's introduction of tariffs that led the Dow Jones to plummet 7.9%, while the S&P 500 dropped 9.1%...
